amendment.description: Amendment requires a GAO study of how much money and energy has been saved by American consumers as a result of the increased energy efficiency measures undertaken in title I of the bill (the Silver Star and Gold Star programs), and whether the savings are greater than the cost of the implementation of title I of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 111-475 to require a GAO study of how much money and energy has been saved by American consumers as a result of the increased energy efficiency measures undertaken in title I of the bill (the Silver Star and Gold Star programs), and whether the savings are greater than the cost of the implementation of title I of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
